    • onLanguageChanged

      public void onLanguageChanged(String newLanguage)
      Description copied from class: ControllerBase
      Called when the application language changes. Subclasses should override this method to refresh their UI texts.
      Specified by:
      onLanguageChanged in interface LanguageManager.LanguageChangeListener
      Overrides:
      onLanguageChanged in class ControllerBase
      Parameters:
      newLanguage - the new language code (e.g., "en", "it")
